thread.title: Abeiku Ainooson 'begs' Kennedy Ashia to join him at Asante Kotoko
thread.title_full: Abeiku Ainooson 'begs' Kennedy Ashia to join him at Asante Kotoko

title: Abeiku Ainooson 'begs' Kennedy Ashia to join him at Asante Kotoko
text:
Sports News | 7 October 2015 21:55 CET Abeiku Ainooson 'begs' Kennedy Ashia to join him at Asante Kotoko Kennedy Ashia of Liberty Professionals celebrate goal. During the 1st Capital Plus Premier League Â©Christian Thompson/BackpagePix 
By: Enoch Fiifi Forson Follow writer on Twitter @Efson_ 
Asante kotoko defender Abeiku Ainoonson has backed his sides pursuit of out of contract prodigy Kennedy Ashia. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us IF THE ACCUSES A MAN LET THE RESULT ABSORB HIM FROM BLAME END JUSTIFY THE MEANS By: MORIE B AMARA
